meanings.definition: Superlative form of skanky: dirty, unkempt, or unpleasant in appearance or smell.
meanings.sent1: The alley behind the restaurant was the skankiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The skankiest socks were left on the floor for weeks.
meanings.sent3: Even the rats avoided the skankiest corner of the basement.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the skankiest, like a forgotten cave.
meanings.sent5: The skankiest dumpster emitted a putrid odor.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of skanky: morally or sexually offensive.
meanings.sent1: The skankiest movie they watched had scenes that made them uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She overheard the skankiest gossip at the party.
meanings.sent3: The skankiest joke he told made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: His behavior at the party was the skankiest, crossing all boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The skankiest behavior was not tolerated in their community.
